direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods add text nodes to the element, but at different positions (start vs. end).
Both methods involve adding content to the element, but one adds a text node and the other adds an element.
Both methods add content to the element, but append handles HTML strings while prependText handles text nodes.
Both methods add content to the start of the element, but prepend handles HTML strings while prependText handles text nodes.
Both methods set the text content of the element, but text replaces existing content while prependText adds to the start.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the element to be initialized before adding content.
Environment setup is required before modifying the element's content.
Both methods modify the element's text content and can be verified for correctness.
